briefTitle: A Study of Daclatasvir and Sofosbuvir With Ribavirin in Subjects With Cirrhosis and Genotype 3 Hepatitis C Infection
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Evaluation of Daclatasvir and Sofosbuvir With Ribavirin in Cirrhotic Subjects With Genotype 3 Chronic Hepatitis C Infection
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether 24 weeks of Daclatasvir and Sofosbuvir with Ribavirin is safe and effective in the treatment of genotype 3 hepatitis C infected patients with liver cirrhosis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response (SVR12)
